resources.string: Connect your Lending Club account by entering your Account ID and API Key. Click here for help.

Sign in to Lending Club on their website. Your Account ID is shown under Account > Summary, where it says "My Account #12345678". Your API Credentials may be found by going to Setting. Under "API Settings", click the refresh button to obtain your key, which should look like this: "Abc4EfgHIjKLmN0P36stUVwX9Z="
The account ID must be numeric
